title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 517.14 - Rate adjustments after audit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 517.14 - Rate adjustments after audit

State Regulations

Audit adjustments which result in rate revisions must be
applied to all rate periods which are affected by the audited costs. Any
resulting adjustment to the reimbursement of a provider may be satisfied
pursuant to Part 518 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
517.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
